nl.tudelft.jpacman.level

Class CollisionInteractionMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.CollisionInteractionMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionMap

    public class CollisionInteractionMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollisionMap
    A map of possible collisions and their handlers.

    • Method Detail

      • onCollision

        public <C1 extends Unit,C2 extends Unit> void onCollision(java.lang.Class<C1> collider,
                                                          java.lang.Class<C2> collidee,
                                                          CollisionInteractionMap.CollisionHandler<C1,C2> handler)
        Adds a two-way collision interaction to this collection, i.e. the collision handler will be used for both C1 versus C2 and C2 versus C1.
        Type Parameters:
        C1 - The collider type.
        C2 - The collidee (unit that was moved into) type.
        Parameters:
        collider - The collider type.
        collidee - The collidee type.
        handler - The handler that handles the collision.

      • onCollision

        public <C1 extends Unit,C2 extends Unit> void onCollision(java.lang.Class<C1> collider,
                                                          java.lang.Class<C2> collidee,
                                                          boolean symetric,
                                                          CollisionInteractionMap.CollisionHandler<C1,C2> handler)
        Adds a collision interaction to this collection.
        Type Parameters:
        C1 - The collider type.
        C2 - The collidee (unit that was moved into) type.
        Parameters:
        collider - The collider type.
        collidee - The collidee type.
        symetric - true if this collision is used for both C1 against C2 and vice versa; false if only for C1 against C2.
        handler - The handler that handles the collision.
